name: Baked Sausage Dip
author: Chris Horvath
summary: A sausage dip I made up for my culinary classes when we did a lab with chips (made in the microwave) and dips.
ingredients: 2 cloves garlic, minced, or more to taste
directions: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Heat 2 teaspoons oil in a saute pan over medium heat
Cook and stir sausage until browned and crumbly, 5 to 7 minutes
Drain on a paper towel-lined plate
Add remaining 2 teaspoons oil to the same pan
Saute onion, pepper, and garlic until onion is translucent, about 5 minutes
Add cream cheese, marinara sauce, and Italian seasoning
Pour mixture into a baking dish
Top with mozzarella cheese and Parmesan cheese
Bake in the preheated oven until cheeses melt and start to brown, 25 to 30 minutes
